li.label: Force Sensitive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has the ability to feel the force that surrounds us.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Force Apprentice
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has begun to control the force, but requires further training and guidance.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Jedi
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Has begun the journey to becoming a Jedi Knight.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Jedi Knight
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has attained the rank of Knight of the Jedi Order.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Jedi Master
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the most respected of the Jedi Order, a true Master.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Jedi Consular
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is ranked among the elite Jedi, those who are fit to serve on the Council.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Sith
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] Has begun the journey to the Dark side of the force.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Sith Inquisitor
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is devoted to the dark side, spreading terror and flaring passions in their wake.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Sith Lord
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the most feared in the galaxy, the Dark Lords of the Sith.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Sith Master
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned to the dark side of the force, able to tap near-limitless power.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Gray Padawan
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exploring the balance of the Force.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Gray Jedi
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is devoted to maintaining the balance of the Force.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Gray Master
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master Jedi, devoted to the 'living Force'.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)

li.label: Gray Sage
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is attuned to the Living Force. [PAWN_pronoun] sees HIMself as an extension of it's will.\n\n(Star Wars - The Force)
